name: basic-service-worker
description: A basic Service Worker to make your web app work offline

scripts.sign-cert: openssl x509 -req -sha256 -days 3650 -in ssl/localhost-csr.pem -signkey ssl/private-key.pem -out ssl/localhost-cert.pem -extfile ssl/openssl.cnf -extensions v3_req
scripts.generate-cert: npm run private-key && npm run req-cert && npm run sign-cert
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp service-worker.js dist/service-worker.js && cp sw-registration.js dist/sw-registration.js && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp index.html dist/index.html &&  cp -r src dist/src && cp -r about dist/about
